# Reference
<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Classes

* [`profile_apache::common`](#profile_apachecommon): This class can be used to setup default
apache configuration.
* [`profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1`](#profile_apachereverse_proxy_v1): This class can be used to create a proxy for
* [`profile_apache::webserver`](#profile_apachewebserver): This class can be used to create a simple
webserver with ssl

## Classes

### profile_apache::common

profile_apache::common

Configures a basic apache setup.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_apache::common
```

##### 

```puppet
# Hierafile:
---
profile_apache::common::ssl_cert: <ssl_certificate>
profile_apache::common::ssl_key: <ssl_key>
profile_apache::common::cert_key_name: <name-key-cert>
profile_apache::common::default_vhost: <true|false>
profile_apache::common::default_confd_files: <true|false>
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_apache::common` class.

##### `cert_key_name`

Data type: `String`

The name or the certificate and key files

Default value: 'fidesintra.net'

##### `ssl_cert`

Data type: `String`

The ssl_cert for the proxy to use
@note If no cert is defined the default cert
  from the common.yml will be used.

Default value: `undef`

##### `ssl_key`

Data type: `String`

The ssl_key for the proxy to use
@note If no key is defined the default key
  from the common.yml will be used.

Default value: `undef`

##### `default_vhost`

Data type: `Boolean`

Define if a default vhost apache configuration
should be set up

Default value: `false`

##### `default_confd_files`

Data type: `Boolean`

Define if the default apache confd files should be
created or not.

Default value: `false`

### profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1

profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1

Creates a ssl reverse proxy to a specific port on
the same server.

middleware services

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1
```

##### 

```puppet
# Hierafile:
---
profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1::httpd:redirect: <true|false>
profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1::cert_key_name: fidesintra.net
profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1::servername: <$::hostname>
profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1::redirect_port: 8080
profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1::https_port: 443
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_apache::reverse_proxy_v1` class.

##### `http_redirect`

Data type: `Boolean`

Also allows redirection on port 80 without ssl.

Default value: `false`

##### `cert_key_name`

Data type: `String`

The name or the certificate and key files

Default value: 'fidesintra.net'

##### `servername`

Data type: `String`

The name of the alias or hostname of the server

Default value: $::hostname

##### `redirect_port`

Data type: `Integer[0, 65535]`

Define the port where to redirect.

Default value: 8080

##### `https_port`

Data type: `Integer[0, 65535]`

Define the port used by https

Default value: 443

### profile_apache::webserver

profile_apache::webserver

Creates a ssl webserver with a simple index.html
being placed one time

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_apache::webserver
```

##### 

```puppet
# Hierafile:
---
profile_apache::webserver::cert_key_name: fidesintra.net
profile_apache::webserver::http_redirect: false
profile_apache::webserver::servername: d-testclient03
profile_apache::webserver::https_port: 8443
profile_apache::webserver::document_root: '/var/www/docroot/'
profile_apache::webserver::index_source: 'puppet:///modules/profile_foo/index.html'
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_apache::webserver` class.

##### `http_redirect`

Data type: `Boolean`

Also allows redirection on port 80 without ssl.

Default value: `false`

##### `cert_key_name`

Data type: `String`

The name or the certificate and key files

Default value: 'fidesintra.net'

##### `servername`

Data type: `String`

The name of the alias or hostname of the server

Default value: $::hostname

##### `https_port`

Data type: `Integer[0, 65535]`

Define the port used by https

Default value: 443

##### `document_root`

Data type: `String`

Define the document root directory used for the
webserver

Default value: '/var/www/html/'

##### `index_source`

Data type: `String`

The source path for initially adding a index.html file

Default value: 'puppet:///modules/profile_apache/webserver/index.html'
